item.description: We'll keep this open for either Doggie Day or the Boston Common (meet near the Boylston T-Stop). Just make note of which you'll attend in your RSVP. I'll cancel one if there is not attendence or if the weather goes bad. Otherwise, we'll have 2 groups. For those who didn't make the Commons last time, it was a lot of fun to get the dogs outside. Let's hope the weather cools off a tad though!
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua August Meetup
